title: Jefferson National Expansion Memorial: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery               Photo Gallery       If you need an image of Jefferson National Expansion Memorial for study use or for publication purposes and you cannot find the appropriate image in these galleries please try the NPS Focus site or contact Kathleen Moenster or Jennifer Clark at (314) 655-1600.  Â                 The Gateway Arch and Grounds   17 Photos  Pictures of the Gateway Arch and the grounds of the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial          The Old Courthouse   50 Photos  Pictures of the Old Courthouse, part of the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial          Facebook   112 Photos  You don't have to follow us on FaceBook to see the pictures we post there! But if you want to follow us, here's the URL: www.facebook.com/GatewayArchNPS            At the Top!   8 Photos  Photos of events that take place at the top of the Gateway Arch.          Events Held Outside on the Arch Grounds   64 Photos  Events such as Fair St. Louis, Park Palooza, Marine Week, Get Outdoors etc.....          August 1, 1804   7 Photos  The Lewis and Clark Journey Photo Album Wednesday, August 1, 1804 Near Council Bluffs, Iowa            August 12, 1805   7 Photos  The Lewis and Clark Journey monday, August 12, 1805 Lemhi Pass, Montana/Idaho          August 13, 1805   7 Photos  The Lewis and Clark Journey Photo Album Tuesday, August 13, 1805 Lemhi Pass, Montana/Idaho          April 25, 1805   8 Photos  The Lewis and Clark Journey Photo Album Thursday, April 25, 1805 Near Fort Union Trading Post National Historic Site, North Dakota            September 24, 1804   7 Photos  The Lewis and Clark Journey Photo Album Monday, September 24, 1804 Near Pierre, South Dakota
